name: Groupout
tag_list: social-commerce, events, activities, isango, meetup, viator, gidsy
overview:
Background -

Founded in 2011, Groupout is one of the UK’s fastest growing Social Commerce platforms providing group Activity, Events & Experiences across Europe.

Competitors in the group Activity, Events & Experiences vertical include Gidsy & Isango in Europe and Viator & MeetUp in the USA.

Partnering with Groupout -

Working with GroupOut.com is quick and easy and by partnering with us you can provide a branded events portal and exciting offers to both your paying and non-paying site visitors.

With new events every day there are even more reasons for your members to return to your site, increasing their time on site and their interaction with other members too.

By partnering with us you can easily provide exciting events to your visitors every day, increasing customer engagement, increasing customer sign-ups and earning your business unlimited additional revenue.

Early Adopters -

GroupOut is all about providing your single visitors with opportunities to make real connections. On your dating site’s behalf, we organise daily events and handpicked experiences that can be shared with your single visitors and their friends.

Our mission is to make being single a fantastic, engaging and interesting time in a person’s life. To do so we identify the activities and events that make any city an interesting and exciting place to live and bring adventurous, loyal new customers to local businesses.
